summary: Senior Python Developer and Data Engineer with over a decade of experience in processing, analyzing, and modeling financial market data. Specialized in Pandas, Polars, and high-performance numerical computations for trading and risk management systems. Proven track record in designing end-to-end ETL pipelines, implementing derivative pricing models, and integrating analytics platforms with execution and trading systems. Skilled in optimizing large-scale data workflows, building real-time risk monitoring tools, and delivering analytics platforms for front-office teams.
